articles.content: Arsenal head into this weekend two points clear of rivals Tottenham in the race for the top four following three successive victories, and know that they could see that points gap extend to five foll… [+2727 chars]

articles.title: Pep Guardiola's Real Madrid comments are just what Man City need in the Premier League - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: If Liverpool think Manchester City will capitulate after Wednesday night, they may well be mistaken.
articles.content:
Very few defeats in football could sting quite as much as Manchester City's collapse at Real Madrid on Wednesday.
